definition: A person who instructs and educates others in the subject related to the German language, typically employed in educational institutions or language schools.

examples.german: Die Deutschlehrerin korrigiert die Aufsätze der Schüler.
examples.english: The German teacher corrects the students' essays.
The German teacher regularly organizes class trips.

examples.german: Die Deutschlehrerin erklärt die deutsche Kultur und Traditionen.
examples.english: The German teacher explains German culture and traditions.

examples.german: Die Deutschlehrerin gibt den Schülern Hausaufgaben auf.
examples.english: The German teacher assigns homework to the students.
